trends: There has been one other sighting in Halifax
There were no other sightings in Halifax on or around June 30th 1968
Summary: Solid yellow white sphere with solid glow 5 to 10
divs: Sighting DetailsI was on Bannister rd. in Halifax, Va at the age of 13. I saw a bright, solidglowing globe moving steady but very slowly at treetop level aprox 80 to 100feet from me. I followed this object for nearly 10 miniutes. I rode a bicycle ona dead end street which made a 30 degree turn at the chrest, where the objectturned to follow the road. It crossed a road perpindicular to the street it wasfollowing and slowly moved out of sight. Speed could have been about 2 or 3 mph.It made absolutely no sound at all. I was cuious but not thrilled until about 6or 7 years ago. The Roswell revelation made me rethink my memory
